1.verse: Praise ye the LORD. Praise the LORD, O my soul.

2.verse: While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.

3.verse: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.

4.verse: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.

5.verse: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:

6.verse: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:

7.verse: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The LORD looseth the prisoners:

8.verse: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous:

9.verse: The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.

10.verse: The LORD shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the LORD.
